content: With the Goat Skull equipped, using the Gourd moderately increases maximum health for a short duration. This duration is rather brief, but in the middle of a fight or when at low health, it can give you an extra buffer beyond your regular health to either be more aggressive, or flee and take out an enemy or two on the way.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Goat_Skull.md', within the main section titled 'Goat Skull'.
The content is as follows:
With the Goat Skull equipped, using the Gourd moderately increases maximum health for a short duration. This duration is rather brief, but in the middle of a fight or when at low health, it can give you an extra buffer beyond your regular health to either be more aggressive, or flee and take out an enemy or two on the way.
